post.body: You could use this as a chance to clean out the cupboards & freezer. :)
Nice gift for oneself!
I think that is perfect for a Christmas card. She is adorable!
I'm glad you figured them out.
I hope he made it okay and he is safe.
Nope, we don't have a GPS either. Can't say we plan on getting one either.
Wow! Did you contact her to tell her to take it down? Obviously, she is able to read English if she posted it in English.
Oh, poor thing. I hope she feels better soon.
A tragedy that no family should have to suffer through. My heart goes out to the Travolta family.
I feel awful they are doing this to u. I remember it feeling like they steal a piece of ur soul. I get what you are going thru.
Lots & lots of {{{{cyber-hugs}}}}!
yourself to be taken advantage of again. That way you stand up for yourself and keep your job. Sorry you are dealing w/this.
but I do think that you need to let someone (bosses, thief, HR) know that while you will keep quiet this time, you won't allow
Oh, I understand needing the income & I'm not saying quit or go against your bosses (who I think are handling this all wrong),
If you do absolutely nothing, they are going to do it again. This is your work & you should be the one getting the credit.
what she did & it was wrong. It is also illegal, but it doesn't seem to matter to your bosses. You can't let it go completely.
Not a good precedence to set. I would at least talk to her if possible & let her know that publicly you won't out her, but you
Wow, that is good growth - congratulations.
Weather sucks, so we are staying in town, but we'll still have fun. Okay, off to do another load of laundry. So much fun is my life. :)
Her mom's taking the kids, so she can finish Christmas shopping in peace-how sweet is that?!?! I'm driving, cuz she is still on painkillers.
I also have to do another load of laundry & make chicken parm to take to her. I told her I'd make her dinner this evening.
We just got home from seeing Santa & out to lunch. Now is naptime, then off to my friends to take her shopping. She had surgery Thursday.
It is snowing again. We just got 10" on Thursday night/Friday morning, now we have more coming down. No worries about a white Christmas.
Then I think I'm going to try to sneak away by myself & finish some of the shopping I have to do.
We finished decorating the tree last night. And I have most of the presents wrapped. Today we are visiting Santa @ Home Depot.
Wow! Funeral was an amazing tribute to an amazing person. Not a dry eye in the church.
I'm not sure what I said yesterday, but WOW I lost almost 20 followers. Whatever it was, I guess I'm sorry if it was offensive.
Schools been closed. I have to find a sitter for Trinity cuz I have a funeral to attend this morning. *sigh* I hate stress before breakfast.
Chicken is baking in the oven, so I should be safe to leave for 20 minutes. We are wrapping presents tonight, so I'll see you all tomorrow.
Friend had laproscopic surgery today for endometriosis. I'm headed there now while DH & Trinity are playing racquetball. Should take nap. .
Trinity decided 2:30 a.m. was an appropriate time to wake up for the day. I am so exhausted I'm not sure I know up from down. YAWN!
I was up way too late & Trinity was up way too early - does not bode well for the busy, busy day I have today. Luckily school isn't closed.
Okay, I'm getting motivated now. So much to do today & if I don't start moving we'll be running late.
Not feeling very well this morning & we have our last Christmas celebration today. I have to clean out the car & pack up all the presents.
DH should be home soon, so he & Trinity can go play racquetball. I am staying home to make dinner, but I don't have any ideas yet.
I may have to make it up from memory, which could be bad or good. Now I'm obsessed & I should be figuring out tonight's dinner.
I can't find my Mom's recipe for Oyster soup. I promised my FIL I'd make it for him tomorrow. None of the recipes online are close to Mom's.
I have the world's greatest husband, too bad he is also the world's biggest PITA!!
I need to get motivated. I need to get motivated. I need to get motivated. I need to get motivated. I need to get motivated.
Well, keys are turned in, final rent payment made - I guess it is time to start over. I'm a little sad, but know it is for the best.
